meanings.sent1: Walking on the sidewalk is a riskless activity.

meanings.sent3: The riskless cat decided to watch the adventurous dog from the safety of the window.
meanings.sent4: His riskless strategy in the game made him unbeatable.
meanings.sent5: The riskless path through the forest was well-lit and clear.

meanings.definition: Without the possibility of loss or harm.
meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet makes biking almost riskless.
meanings.sent2: The bank offered a riskless investment opportunity with guaranteed returns.
meanings.sent3: The riskless bubble wrap protected the fragile items during shipping.
meanings.sent4: Her riskless decision to bring an umbrella saved her from getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The riskless plan to double-check the address before leaving prevented any mistakes.
